name: The Last Knight!
description:
This is my Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2 submission! Fight for the kingdom in this Rouge-lite adventure! As the last knight left you feel lonely, but you're not alone and help may come from an unlikely source!

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Space Bar to attack and continue through text.

Known bugs: If you attack once then stand still and try to attack no damage will be delt. Press any of the move keys to be able to attack again.

Note: After the knight walks off the screen press space to continue :)

Note2: Sorry that my UI scaling is off... but I'm out of time to fix it haha Hope you can still enjoy the game!

P.S. There is a secret room with a cheat!
